arcpocalypse.subtitles.entity.neco_arc.t: Neco Arc mocks your distinct lack of neco-arc-ness
arcpocalypse.subtitles.entity.neco_arc.h: Neco Arc emits a resonant cry of pain
Neco Ciel derides your absolute scarcity of neco-ciel-ness
arcpocalypse.tn.note.1: As normal Ciel is a member of the Holy Church in Tsukihime. I wrote following translation key as a biblical reference, for proper translation please reference Mark 15:37â€“39 in your language. I am sorry.
Neco Ciel utters a loud cry, yet to breath her last
arcpocalypse.subtitles.entity.neco_akiha: Neco Akiha jeers at your obvious privation of neco-akiha-ness
Neco Akiha expresses an echoing scream of torture
arcpocalypse.subtitles.entity.neco_kohak: Neco Kohaku pities your dearth of neco-kohaku-ness
Neco Kohaku screams a sonorous wail of strain
arcpocalypse.subtitles.entity.neco_hisui: Neco Hisui scoffs at your utter absence of neco-hisui-ness
Neco Hisui emits a ringing howl of misery
arcpocalypse.subtitles.entity.neco_all.b: The power of the True Ancestors is made manifest
arcpocalypse.midnightconfig.title: Arcpocalypse
arcpocalypse.midnightconfig.boomboom: Explosions on landing after Neco-Arc rockets
arcpocalypse.midnightconfig.boomboom.too:
Enabled: Explosions damage blocks, entities. 
World Safe: Explosions damage entities, world is preserved. 
Full Safe: Explosions do not damage entities nor the world, essentially cosmetic. 
Disabled: Explosions went to the Crocodile Garden, byebye explosions!
arcpocalypse.midnightconfig.lasertime.to:
Enabled: Lasers damage entities, burn blocks. 
World Safe: Lasers damage entities, world does not get burnt. 
Full Safe: Lasers will neither damage entities nor burn the world. 
Disabled: Lasers got cut into 17 pieces, farewell lasers!
arcpocalypse.midnightconfig.explainTheTh: World-safe mode disables any destructive properties the abilities may have, whilst Full-Safe mode does not damage entities nor the world. All Ability settings are synced when joining servers.
arcpocalypse.midnightconfig.burenya.tool: Control for how loud Neco-Arc's Ambient/Taunting noises are.
arcpocalypse.midnightconfig.doTheTransfo: If enabled, this skips the abyss lift and just has people right click the associated item for the form. (Ie: The Marble for Neco-Arc, the Cross for Neco-Ciel.)
